text: Sir Raymond Albert Maillard Carr FBA FRHS FRSL (11 April 1919 â€“ 19 April 2015),CARR, Sir (Albert) Raymond (Maillard) at Who's Who online (accessed 11 January 2008) known as Raymond Carr, was an English historian. His works were mostly about the history of Spain, Latin America, and Sweden. He was also Warden of St Antony's College, Oxford, from 1968 to 1987. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:Academics of the University of Oxford Category:English historians Category:People from Bath, Somerset Category:Writers from Somerset
title: Raymond Carr
